creator: korfut@lycos.com
text:
As i mentioned on the Tomcat bug database, i am facing a problem creating a war 
file: http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=13733
They said to use another tool but i really CAN'T !!
i have so much work done with ANT-TOMCAT interaction. If this is not a bug , is 
there any way to disable the Automatic generation of lower case when the entire 
file or folder name is all upper case?
Thank you.

creator: stevel@apache.org
text:
You say that the <war> task is broken because winzip shows that WEB-INF is lower
case? Winzip is lying to you, in a fit of user friendliness it lower cases all
upper case directories.

use jar to unzip the war file, look at the case of stuff there, Also make sure
that you use the <webinf> element inside that task to specify the web inf stuff,
so it works regardless of the case of the web inf dir on your file system.

Marking as closed. Believe me, if you couldnt generate WAR files for tomcat, we
would have noticed a long time ago.
